body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004, 'Head and neck']/items[at0009, 'Redness']/value as T0_redness,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004, 'Upper limbs']/items[at0009, 'Redness']/value as T0_redness_1
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.easi_score.v0]
  )
LIMIT
  1
ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
